name: Binary Towers
description:
Binary Towers is a game made for GTMK Game Jam 2020 with the theme "Out Of Control"

The game is a tower defense game where you have no control on the placement of the towers. The only control you have is the binary digits at the bottom right of the screen. At every wave the placement of the towers are also out of your control.

Have fun defending!

Version 1

- Game without tower upgradee

Version 1.1

- Game with tower upgrades

Models from Unity Asset Store

SFX from Unity Asset Store

BGM from https://www.bensound.com
